name: Tuna, Tomato, and Basil Tartare
description: Fresh tuna, smashed together with fresh tomatoes and basil, olive oil, and salt.  The perfect summer feast.
recipeIngredient: 10 to 12 ounces sushi grade fresh tuna, sinew removed, roughly chopped
1 vine-ripened tomato, seeds discarded, roughly chopped
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 teaspoon white wine vinegar, plus more taste
1 baguette, sliced into thin rounds, toasted

recipeInstructions.text: Combine tuna, tomato, shallot, and basil in bowl of food processer. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Pulse 10 times. Scrape down the sides with a silicone spatula, and pulse until roughly chopped, about 10 more 1-second pulses.
Transfer to a bowl. Toss with olive oil and vinegar (see note). Serve immediately with toasted baguette slices.
